00025 #ifndef __MAP_H_
00026 #define __MAP_H_
00027 
00028 #include "Screen.nxc"
00029 #include "Angle.nxc"
00030 #include "Vector.nxc"
00031 
00032 #define MAP_X(map, index) (map.landmarks[(index * 2)]);
00033 #define MAP_Y(map, index) (map.landmarks[(index * 2) + 1]);
00034 
00038 struct Map
00039 {
00040     long landmarks[];
00041 };
00042 
00047 void MapArrayLandmarks(Map &map, long &landmarks[])
00048 {
00049     ArrayBuild(map.landmarks, landmarks);
00050 }
00051 
00055 void MapAddLandMark(Map &map, int x, int y)
00056 {
00057     ArrayBuild(map.landmarks, x, y);
00058 }
00059 
00063 int MapGetNumLandmarks (Map &map)
00064 {
00065     return ArrayLen(map.landmarks)/2;
00066 }
00067 
00071 void MapGetLandmark(Map &map, int index, Vector &vec)
00072 {
00073     long x, y;
00074 
00075     x = MAP_X(map, index);
00076     y = MAP_Y(map, index);
00077     VectorInit(vec, x, y, 0);
00078 }
00079 
00093 bool MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(Map &map, Vector &reference, int minAngle,
00094                                    int maxAngle, Vector &retLandmark)
00095 {
00096     long minDistance = 20000000;
00097     long minIndex = -1;
00098     int size;
00099     int flipCheck = false;
00100     int angleDiff = maxAngle;
00101     
00102     if (minAngle > maxAngle) flipCheck = true;
00103 
00104     size = MapGetNumLandmarks(map);
00105     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00106     {
00107         Vector landmark;
00108         MapGetLandmark(map, i, landmark);
00109         VectorSubtract(landmark, reference);
00110         long distance = VectorGetDistanceVec(reference, landmark);
00111         int angle = VectorGetAngleVec(reference, landmark);
00112         if (flipCheck == false && (angle >= minAngle && angle <= maxAngle) &&
00113             distance < minDistance)
00114         {
00115             minIndex = i;
00116             minDistance = distance;
00117         }
00118         else if (flipCheck == true && (angle >= minAngle || angle <= maxAngle) &&
00119             distance < minDistance)
00120         {
00121             minIndex = i;
00122             minDistance = distance;
00123         }
00124     }
00125     if (minIndex >= 0)
00126     {
00127         MapGetLandmark(map, minIndex, retLandmark);
00128         return true;
00129     }
00130     return false;
00131 }
00132 
00141 bool MapFindTriangulationLandmarks(Map &map, Vector &reference,
00142                                    int minAngle, int maxAngle,
00143                                    Vector &landmark1, Vector &landmark2)
00144 {
00145     bool found1 = false;
00146     bool found2 = false;
00147     int min, mid, max;
00148     Vector lm1, lm2;
00149 
00150     min = minAngle;
00151     max = maxAngle;
00152 
00153     while (true)
00154     {
00155         int angleDiff = maxAngle;
00156         angleDiff = AngleAbsSub(angleDiff, minAngle);
00157 
00158         // Print("maxAngle= %d", maxAngle, 0);
00159         // Print("minAngle = %d", minAngle, 0);
00160         // Print("angleDiff = %d", angleDiff, 1000);
00161         
00162         /* Calculate mid of current min-max */
00163         mid = min;
00164         mid = AngleAbsAdd(mid, angleDiff/2);
00165         
00166         found1 = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, min, mid, lm1);
00167         found2 = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, mid, max, lm2);
00168         
00169         if (found1 == false && found2 == false)
00170             return false;
00171         if (found1 == true && found2 == true)
00172         {
00173             landmark1 = lm1;
00174             landmark2 = lm2;
00175             return true;
00176         }
00177         if (angleDiff < 20) /* Angle too acute */
00178         {
00179             return false;
00180         }
00181         if (found1 == true) /* Only found in 1st half */
00182         {
00183             max = mid;
00184         }
00185         else /* Only found in 2nd half */
00186         {
00187             min = mid;
00188         }
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00198 bool MapFindNearestLandmark(Map &map, Vector &reference, Vector &retLandmark)
00199 {
00200     int size;
00201     long minDistance = 2000000000;
00202     long distance;
00203     
00204     size = MapGetNumLandmarks(map);
00205     if (size <= 0) return false;
00206     
00207     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00208     {
00209         Vector landmark;
00210         MapGetLandmark(map, i, landmark);
00211         VectorSubtract(landmark, reference);
00212         distance = VectorGetDistance(landmark);
00213         if (distance > minDistance)
00214         {
00215             minDistance = distance;
00216             MapGetLandmark(map, i, retLandmark);
00217         }
00218     }
00219     return true;
00220 }

00222 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00223 
00224 long testLandmarks[4] = {250, 250, 250, -250, -250, 250, -250, -250};
00225 void TestMap()
00226 {
00227     bool found;
00228     Map map;
00229     Vector reference, detectedObject, landmark1, landmark2;
00230 
00231     MapArrayLandmarks(map, testLandmarks);
00232 
00233     VectorInit(reference, 0, 0, 0);
00234     found = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, 350, 105,
00235                                           detectedObject);
00236     TEST((found == true), "No landmark at 45");
00237     TEST((detectedObject.x == 250 && detectedObject.y == 250),
00238          "No object 1");
00239          
00240     found = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, 75, 195,
00241                                           detectedObject);
00242     TEST((found == true), "No landmark at 135");
00243     TEST((detectedObject.x == -250 && detectedObject.y == 250),
00244          "No object 2");
00245 
00246     found = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, 165, 285,
00247                                           detectedObject);
00248     TEST((found == true), "No landmark at 225");
00249     TEST((detectedObject.x == -250 && detectedObject.y == -250),
00250          "No object 3");
00251 
00252     found = MapFindNearestLandmarkAtAngle(map, reference, 225, 375,
00253                                           detectedObject);
00254     TEST((found == true), "No landmark at 315");
00255     TEST((detectedObject.x == 250 && detectedObject.y == -250),
00256          "No object 4");
00257 
00258     found = MapFindTriangulationLandmarks(map, reference, 280, 80,
00259                                           landmark1, landmark2);
00260     TEST((found == true), "landmark tri at 0");
00261     TEST((landmark1.x == 250 && landmark1.y == -250),
00262          "No tri object 1");
00263     TEST((landmark2.x == 250 && landmark2.y == 250),
00264          "No tri object 2");
00265 
00266     found = MapFindTriangulationLandmarks(map, reference, 10, 170,
00267                                           landmark1, landmark2);
00268     TEST((found == true), "landmark tri at 90");
00269     TEST((landmark1.x == 250 && landmark1.y == 250),
00270          "No tri object 1");
00271     TEST((landmark2.x == -250 && landmark2.y == 250),
00272          "No tri object 2");
00273 
00274     found = MapFindTriangulationLandmarks(map, reference, 110, 260,
00275                                           landmark1, landmark2);
00276     TEST((found == true), "landmark tri at 90");
00277     TEST((landmark1.x == -250 && landmark1.y == 250),
00278          "No tri object 1");
00279     TEST((landmark2.x == -250 && landmark2.y == -250),
00280          "No tri object 2");
00281 
00282     found = MapFindTriangulationLandmarks(map, reference, 190, 350,
00283                                           landmark1, landmark2);
00284     TEST((found == true), "landmark tri at 90");
00285     TEST((landmark1.x == -250 && landmark1.y == -250),
00286          "No tri object 1");
00287     TEST((landmark2.x == 250 && landmark2.y == -250),
00288          "No tri object 2");
00289 }
